remarks: The kernel of a linear functional is a set of vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lkrssv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lkrssv.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrssv.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrssv.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lkrssv.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lkrssv $p |- ( ph -> ( K ` G ) C_ V ) $.
